/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the soft glow of daylight. A white van is parked on the right side of the street, adding a touch of everyday life to the scene. On the left side of the street, a blue building stands out, its color contrasting with the surrounding structures. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, trees can be seen, their green foliage adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. The image is a blend of urban architecture and natural elements, showcasing the unique character of Beijing's streets.
